title: President decries initial actions that led to unruly events on May 09
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa said today (May 11), condemning the initial actions that led to the unruly incidents on the 9th of May, said that he has directed the Inspector-General of Police to conduct an impartial inquiry in this regard.
The Head of State made this remark delivering a special statement to the nation a short while ago.
